title.romaji: Meitantei Conan: Tengoku e no Count Down
title.english: Case Closed: Countdown to Heaven
title.native: 名探偵コナン 天国へのカウントダウン

synonyms: Meitantei Conan Movie 05: Tengoku e no Count Down
Detective Conan Movie 05: Trappola di cristallo
description:
As a pair of towers in Tokyo are being prepared for their grand opening, there is a series of murders of people connected to the towers. Conan suspects that the mysterious Syndicate may also be involved.

(Source: Anime News Network)
